author: marioevz
content:
EIPs targeted for BAL Devnet-2:
- [EIP-8024: Backward compatible SWAPN, DUPN, EXCHANGE](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-8024)
- [EIP-7843: SLOTNUM opcode](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7843)
- [EIP-7708: ETH transfers emit a log](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7708)
- [EIP-7778: Block Gas Accounting without Refunds](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7778)

author: smimz
content:
Hi all, 
Requesting review for the RPC error codes standardization from client teams 
https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/650

author: mariusvanderwijden
content:
I just implemented 7843, the SLOTNUM opcode and its severely underspecified.  
- Field name in the header is inconsistent, should be SlotNumber not slot_number
- Field name in the engine API is inconsistent, should be SlotNumber not slot_number
- Engine API changes are underspecified. We need: NewPayloadV5, ForkChoiceUpdatedV4, GetPayloadV6
cc <@348512261955911691> <@892053833121923094>

content: Tagging felix who is implementing this in EELS

author: txtiger
content:
I have drafted up an initial EELS/EEST implementation of EIP-7932. The PR is based on the Amsterdam branch even though 7932 is DFI’d because there is no Hegotá branch.

See https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/pull/2011
